name: Polter-Purrgation
description:
Some time ago, a catastrophe lead to the end of mankind, leaving neighborhoods desolate save for what few wildlife dared to try to reclaim the land.

Tired of the lingering spirits scaring away more timid prey, a stray feline decides to address the ghost infestation in their territory, and exorcise the stubborn poltergeists once and for all.

Travel through each house, collecting the colored boxes with the items that tie the ghosts to the material plane, and place them in the marked areas to preform the purification. Be careful to avoid the agitated ghosts--they have no qualms about stealing your lives.

Use arrows keys/WASD to move and the spacebar to pick up or place items. Perform the purification as quickly as possible to get a higher score!
